name: Kim
description: Kim er utdannet sivilingeniør fra NTNU innen datateknologi med spesialisering innen kunstig intelligens. Gjennom prosjekter og oppgaver fra Accenture, Bouvet og egen startup har Kim fått erfaring innenfor frontend-utvikling. I tillegg til dette har Kim stor interesse for kunstig intelligens, entreprenørskap og forretningsutvikling.I fritiden bruker Kim mye tid på fitness, helse og trening. Fun fact: Det er vanskeligere å få Kim til å droppe en treningsøkt enn å delta på en.
haiku:
Machines learn her mind
Fitness fuels her digital
Goal-driven perfection
summary_en:
Here is a summary of the description of Kim in 2-3 sentences:

Kim is a civil engineering graduate from NTNU with a specialization in artificial intelligence and data technology. In addition to her academic background, she has gained hands-on experience in frontend development through various projects and tasks at Accenture, Bouvet, and her own startup. When not working, Kim enjoys fitness, health, and training, and is known for being more motivated to stick with a workout routine than attending social events.
